text: Carl von Ossietzky (3 October 1889 â€“ 4 May 1938) was a German journalist and peacemaker. He was awarded the 1935 Nobel Peace Prize because he exposed the secret German re-armament. He was convicted of treason and spying afterwards. ==References== ==Other websites== * Nobel prize biography Category:1889 births Category:1938 deaths Category:German Nobel Prize winners
title: Carl von Ossietzky
